# TreeTools

[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/ms609/TreeTools/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/ms609/TreeTools)
[![CRAN Status
Badge](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/TreeTools)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=TreeTools)
[![CRAN
Downloads](https://cranlogs.r-pkg.org/badges/TreeTools)](https://ms609.github.io/usage/#treetools)
[![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/DOI/10.5281/zenodo.3522726.svg)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3522725)
[![Project Status: Active – – The project has reached a stable, usable
state and is being actively
developed.](https://www.repostatus.org/badges/latest/active.svg)](https://www.repostatus.org/#active)

‘TreeTools’ is an R package that provides efficient implementations of
functions for the creation, modification and analysis of phylogenetic
trees.

Applications include: generation of trees with specified shapes;
analysis of tree shape; rooting of trees and extraction of subtrees;
calculation and depiction of node support; calculation of
ancestor-descendant relationships; import and export of trees from
Newick, Nexus and [TNT](https://www.lillo.org.ar/phylogeny/tnt/)
formats; and analysis of partitions and cladistic information.

It complements packages such as
[‘ape’](https://cran.r-project.org/package=ape),
[‘phangorn’](https://cran.r-project.org/package=phangorn) and
[‘phytools’](https://cran.r-project.org/package=phytools), aiming for
efficient and robust implementations of functions, typically applied to
unweighted trees (i.e. those without edge lengths).

# Installation

Install and load the library from CRAN as follows:

``` r
install.packages("TreeTools")
library("TreeTools")
```

Install the very latest version, which may be under development, with:

``` r
if (!require("devtools")) install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ms609/TreeTools")
```

Please note that the ‘TreeTools’ project is released with a [Contributor
Code of Conduct](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md).
By contributing to this project, you agree to its terms.

# Package index

## Tree manipulation

Functions for editing phylogenetic trees.

- [`AddTip()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/AddTip.md)
  [`AddTipEverywhere()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/AddTip.md)
  : Add a tip to a phylogenetic tree
- [`CollapseNode()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/CollapseNode.md)
  [`CollapseEdge()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/CollapseNode.md)
  : Collapse nodes on a phylogenetic tree
- [`ConsensusWithout()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ConsensusWithout.md)
  [`MarkMissing()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ConsensusWithout.md)
  : Reduced consensus, omitting specified taxa
- [`DropTip()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/DropTip.md)
  [`KeepTip()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/DropTip.md)
  [`DropTipPhylo()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/DropTip.md)
  [`KeepTipPreorder()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/DropTip.md)
  [`KeepTipPostorder()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/DropTip.md)
  : Drop leaves from tree
- [`ImposeConstraint()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ImposeConstraint.md)
  [`AddUnconstrained()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ImposeConstraint.md)
  : Force a tree to match a constraint
- [`KeptPaths()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/KeptPaths.md)
  : Paths present in reduced tree
- [`KeptVerts()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/KeptVerts.md)
  : Identify vertices retained when leaves are dropped
- [`LeafLabelInterchange()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/LeafLabelInterchange.md)
  : Leaf label interchange
- [`MakeTreeBinary()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/MakeTreeBinary.md)
  : Generate binary tree by collapsing polytomies
- [`Renumber()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/Renumber.md)
  : Renumber a tree's nodes and tips
- [`RenumberTips()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/RenumberTips.md)
  : Renumber a tree's tips
- [`RootTree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/RootTree.md)
  [`RootOnNode()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/RootTree.md)
  [`UnrootTree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/RootTree.md)
  : Root or unroot a phylogenetic tree
- [`SortTree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/SortTree.md)
  : Sort tree
- [`Subtree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/Subtree.md)
  : Extract a subtree
- [`TipTimedTree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TipTimedTree.md)
  : Display time-calibrated tree using tip information only
- [`SingleTaxonTree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TrivialTree.md)
  [`ZeroTaxonTree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TrivialTree.md)
  : Generate trivial trees

## Tree navigation

Functions to navigate phylogenetic trees.

- [`CladeSizes()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/CladeSizes.md)
  : Clade sizes

- [`DescendantEdges()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/DescendantEdges.md)
  [`DescendantTips()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/DescendantEdges.md)
  : Identify descendant edges

- [`EdgeAncestry()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/EdgeAncestry.md)
  : Ancestors of an edge

- [`EdgeDistances()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/EdgeDistances.md)
  : Distance between edges

- [`ListAncestors()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ListAncestors.md)
  [`AllAncestors()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ListAncestors.md)
  : List ancestors

- [`MRCA()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/MRCA.md) : Most
  recent common ancestor

- [`MatchEdges()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/MatchEdges.md)
  [`MatchNodes()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/MatchEdges.md)
  : Match nodes and edges between trees

- [`NDescendants()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NDescendants.md)
  : Count descendants for each node in a tree

- [`NodeDepth()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NodeDepth.md)
  : Distance of each node from tree exterior

- [`NodeNumbers()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NodeNumbers.md)
  :

  Numeric index of each node in a tree
  [`NodeNumbers()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NodeNumbers.md)
  returns a sequence corresponding to the nodes in a tree

- [`NodeOrder()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NodeOrder.md)
  : Number of edges incident to each node in a tree

- [`RootNode()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/RootNode.md)
  : Which node is a tree's root?

## Tree creation

Functions to generate phylogenetic trees.

- [`ConstrainedNJ()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ConstrainedNJ.md)
  : Constrained neighbour-joining tree

- [`RandomTree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/GenerateTree.md)
  [`YuleTree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/GenerateTree.md)
  [`PectinateTree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/GenerateTree.md)
  [`BalancedTree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/GenerateTree.md)
  [`StarTree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/GenerateTree.md)
  : Generate pectinate, balanced or random trees

- [`NJTree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NJTree.md) :
  Generate a neighbour joining tree

- [`as.TreeNumber()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TreeNumber.md)
  [`as.phylo(`*`<numeric>`*`)`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TreeNumber.md)
  [`as.phylo(`*`<TreeNumber>`*`)`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TreeNumber.md)
  [`as.MixedBase()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TreeNumber.md)
  [`as.phylo(`*`<MixedBase>`*`)`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TreeNumber.md)
  : Unique integer indices for bifurcating tree topologies

- [`SingleTaxonTree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TrivialTree.md)
  [`ZeroTaxonTree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TrivialTree.md)
  : Generate trivial trees

- [`is.TreeNumber()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/is.TreeNumber.md)
  :

  Is an object a `TreeNumber` object?

- [`print(`*`<TreeNumber>`*`)`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/print.TreeNumber.md)
  :

  Print `TreeNumber` object

## Tree properties

Functions describing properties of trees.

- [`CladisticInfo()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/CladisticInfo.md)
  [`CladisticInformation()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/CladisticInfo.md)
  : Cladistic information content of a tree

- [`Consensus()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/Consensus.md)
  : Construct consensus trees

- [`J1Index()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/J1Index.md)
  [`JQIndex()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/J1Index.md)
  : Robust universal tree balance index

- [`SisterSize()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/Stemwardness.md)
  [`RootNodeDistance()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/Stemwardness.md)
  [`RootNodeDist()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/Stemwardness.md)
  : "Stemwardness" of a leaf

- [`TotalCopheneticIndex()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TotalCopheneticIndex.md)
  [`TCIContext()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TotalCopheneticIndex.md)
  : Total Cophenetic Index

- [`Cherries()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/Cherries.md)
  : Count cherries in a tree

- [`ConsensusWithout()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ConsensusWithout.md)
  [`MarkMissing()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ConsensusWithout.md)
  : Reduced consensus, omitting specified taxa

- [`LongBranch()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/LongBranch.md)
  : Identify taxa with long branches

- [`MatchEdges()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/MatchEdges.md)
  [`MatchNodes()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/MatchEdges.md)
  : Match nodes and edges between trees

- [`NSplits()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NSplits.md)
  [`NPartitions()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NSplits.md)
  : Number of distinct splits

- [`NTip()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NTip.md) :
  Number of leaves in a phylogenetic tree

- [`NodeNumbers()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NodeNumbers.md)
  :

  Numeric index of each node in a tree
  [`NodeNumbers()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NodeNumbers.md)
  returns a sequence corresponding to the nodes in a tree

- [`PathLengths()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/PathLengths.md)
  : Calculate length of paths between each pair of vertices within tree

- [`SplitsInBinaryTree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/SplitsInBinaryTree.md)
  :

  Maximum splits in an *n*-leaf tree

- [`TipLabels()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TipLabels.md)
  [`AllTipLabels()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TipLabels.md)
  : Extract tip labels

- [`TreeIsRooted()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TreeIsRooted.md)
  : Is tree rooted?

- [`Treeness()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/Treeness.md)
  [`Stemminess()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/Treeness.md)
  : Relative length of internal branches

- [`RoguePlot()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/RoguePlot.md)
  : Visualize position of rogue taxa

- [`PairwiseDistances()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/PairwiseDistances.md)
  : Distances between each pair of trees

- [`TopologyOnly()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TopologyOnly.md)
  : Remove metadata from trees

## Phylogenetic data

Functions for modifying and evaluating datasets.

- [`Decompose()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/Decompose.md)
  : Decompose additive (ordered) phylogenetic characters

- [`MatrixToPhyDat()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/MatrixToPhyDat.md)
  [`PhyDatToMatrix()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/MatrixToPhyDat.md)
  :

  Convert between matrices and `phyDat` objects

- [`StringToPhyDat()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/PhyToString.md)
  [`StringToPhydat()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/PhyToString.md)
  [`PhyToString()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/PhyToString.md)
  [`PhyDatToString()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/PhyToString.md)
  [`PhydatToString()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/PhyToString.md)
  :

  Convert between strings and `phyDat` objects

- [`Reweight()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/Reweight.md)
  : Reweight phylogenetic characters

- [`ArtificialExtinction()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ArtificialExtinction.md)
  [`ArtEx()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ArtificialExtinction.md)
  : Artificial Extinction

## Parsers

Functions to parse or write files.

- [`as.Newick()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/as.Newick.md)
  : Write a phylogenetic tree in Newick format

- [`ApeTime()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ApeTime.md)
  : Read modification time from "ape" Nexus file

- [`ExtractTaxa()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ExtractTaxa.md)
  [`NexusTokens()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ExtractTaxa.md)
  : Extract taxa from a matrix block

- [`NewickTree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NewickTree.md)
  : Write Newick Tree

- [`ReadCharacters()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ReadCharacters.md)
  [`ReadTntCharacters()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ReadCharacters.md)
  [`ReadTNTCharacters()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ReadCharacters.md)
  [`ReadNotes()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ReadCharacters.md)
  [`ReadAsPhyDat()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ReadCharacters.md)
  [`ReadTntAsPhyDat()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ReadCharacters.md)
  [`ReadTNTAsPhyDat()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ReadCharacters.md)
  [`PhyDat()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ReadCharacters.md)
  : Read phylogenetic characters from file

- [`StringToPhyDat()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/PhyToString.md)
  [`StringToPhydat()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/PhyToString.md)
  [`PhyToString()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/PhyToString.md)
  [`PhyDatToString()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/PhyToString.md)
  [`PhydatToString()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/PhyToString.md)
  :

  Convert between strings and `phyDat` objects

- [`ReadTntTree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ReadTntTree.md)
  [`TntText2Tree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ReadTntTree.md)
  [`TNTText2Tree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ReadTntTree.md)
  : Parse TNT Tree

- [`WriteTntCharacters()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/WriteTntCharacters.md)
  : Write morphological character matrix to TNT file

- [`EndSentence()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/EndSentence.md)
  : Add full stop to end of a sentence

- [`MatchStrings()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/MatchStrings.md)
  : Check for mismatch between character vectors

- [`MorphoBankDecode()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/MorphoBankDecode.md)
  : Decode MorphoBank text

- [`RightmostCharacter()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/RightmostCharacter.md)
  : Rightmost character of string

- [`Unquote()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/Unquote.md)
  : Remove quotation marks from a string

- [`ReadMrBayesTrees()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ReadMrBayesTrees.md)
  [`ReadMrBayes()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ReadMrBayesTrees.md)
  [`MrBayesTrees()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ReadMrBayesTrees.md)
  : Read posterior tree sample produced by MrBayes

## Split manipulation

Functions that manipulate bipartition splits.

- [`DropTip()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/DropTip.md)
  [`KeepTip()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/DropTip.md)
  [`DropTipPhylo()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/DropTip.md)
  [`KeepTipPreorder()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/DropTip.md)
  [`KeepTipPostorder()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/DropTip.md)
  : Drop leaves from tree

- [`SplitConsistent()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/SplitConsistent.md)
  [`SplitConflicts()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/SplitConsistent.md)
  : Identify consistent / conflicting splits

- [`Subsplit()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/Subsplit.md)
  : Subset of a split on fewer leaves

- [`TrivialSplits()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TrivialSplits.md)
  [`WithoutTrivialSplits()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TrivialSplits.md)
  : Identify and remove trivial splits

- [`LabelSplits()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/LabelSplits.md)
  : Label splits

- [`NSplits()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NSplits.md)
  [`NPartitions()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NSplits.md)
  : Number of distinct splits

- [`NTip()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NTip.md) :
  Number of leaves in a phylogenetic tree

- [`PolarizeSplits()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/PolarizeSplits.md)
  : Polarize splits on a single taxon

- [`SplitFrequency()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/SplitFrequency.md)
  : Frequency of splits

- [`as.Splits()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/Splits.md)
  [`as.logical(`*`<Splits>`*`)`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/Splits.md)
  :

  Convert object to `Splits`

- [`SplitsInBinaryTree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/SplitsInBinaryTree.md)
  :

  Maximum splits in an *n*-leaf tree

- [`TipLabels()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TipLabels.md)
  [`AllTipLabels()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TipLabels.md)
  : Extract tip labels

- [`TipsInSplits()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TipsInSplits.md)
  [`SplitImbalance()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TipsInSplits.md)
  : Tips contained within splits

- [`match()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/match.Splits.md)
  [`` `%in%`( ``*`<Splits>`*`,`*`<Splits>`*`)`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/match.Splits.md)
  : Split matching

- [`xor()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/xor.md) :
  Exclusive OR operation

## Information and combinatorics

Functions to calculate factorial quantities.

- [`N1Spr()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/N1Spr.md)
  [`IC1Spr()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/N1Spr.md) :
  Number of trees one SPR step away
- [`DoubleFactorial()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/DoubleFactorial.md)
  [`DoubleFactorial64()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/DoubleFactorial.md)
  [`LnDoubleFactorial()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/DoubleFactorial.md)
  [`Log2DoubleFactorial()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/DoubleFactorial.md)
  [`LogDoubleFactorial()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/DoubleFactorial.md)
  [`LnDoubleFactorial.int()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/DoubleFactorial.md)
  [`LogDoubleFactorial.int()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/DoubleFactorial.md)
  : Double factorial
- [`NPartitionPairs()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NPartitionPairs.md)
  : Distributions of tips consistent with a partition pair
- [`CladisticInfo()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/CladisticInfo.md)
  [`CladisticInformation()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/CladisticInfo.md)
  : Cladistic information content of a tree
- [`NRooted()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NRooted.md)
  [`NUnrooted()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NRooted.md)
  [`NRooted64()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NRooted.md)
  [`NUnrooted64()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NRooted.md)
  [`LnUnrooted()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NRooted.md)
  [`LnUnrooted.int()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NRooted.md)
  [`Log2Unrooted()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NRooted.md)
  [`Log2Unrooted.int()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NRooted.md)
  [`LnRooted()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NRooted.md)
  [`LnRooted.int()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NRooted.md)
  [`Log2Rooted()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NRooted.md)
  [`Log2Rooted.int()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NRooted.md)
  [`LnUnrootedSplits()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NRooted.md)
  [`Log2UnrootedSplits()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NRooted.md)
  [`NUnrootedSplits()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NRooted.md)
  [`LnUnrootedMult()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NRooted.md)
  [`Log2UnrootedMult()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NRooted.md)
  [`NUnrootedMult()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/NRooted.md)
  : Number of trees
- [`TreesMatchingTree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TreesMatchingTree.md)
  [`LnTreesMatchingTree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TreesMatchingTree.md)
  [`Log2TreesMatchingTree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TreesMatchingTree.md)
  : Number of trees containing a tree
- [`CharacterInformation()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/CharacterInformation.md)
  : Character information content
- [`SplitInformation()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/SplitInformation.md)
  [`MultiSplitInformation()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/SplitInformation.md)
  : Phylogenetic information content of splitting leaves into two
  partitions
- [`SplitMatchProbability()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/SplitMatchProbability.md)
  [`LnSplitMatchProbability()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/SplitMatchProbability.md)
  : Probability of matching this well
- [`TreesMatchingSplit()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TreesMatchingSplit.md)
  [`LnTreesMatchingSplit()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TreesMatchingSplit.md)
  [`Log2TreesMatchingSplit()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TreesMatchingSplit.md)
  : Number of trees matching a bipartition split
- [`UnrootedTreesMatchingSplit()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/UnrootedTreesMatchingSplit.md)
  [`LnUnrootedTreesMatchingSplit()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/UnrootedTreesMatchingSplit.md)
  [`Log2UnrootedTreesMatchingSplit()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/UnrootedTreesMatchingSplit.md)
  : Number of trees consistent with split

## Split support

Calculate and depict support for splits (‘edges’ / ‘nodes’) in trees.

- [`LabelSplits()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/LabelSplits.md)
  : Label splits
- [`SplitFrequency()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/SplitFrequency.md)
  : Frequency of splits
- [`SupportColour()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/SupportColour.md)
  [`SupportColor()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/SupportColour.md)
  : Colour for node support value

## Datasets

Data that accompanies the package.

- [`brewer`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/brewer.md) :
  Brewer palettes
- [`doubleFactorials`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/doubleFactorials.md)
  : Double factorials
- [`Lobo.data`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/Lobo.data.md)
  [`Lobo.phy`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/Lobo.data.md)
  : Data from Zhang et al. 2016
- [`logDoubleFactorials`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/logDoubleFactorials.md)
  : Natural logarithms of double factorials
- [`nRootedShapes`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/nRootedShapes.md)
  [`nUnrootedShapes`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/nRootedShapes.md)
  : Number of rooted / unrooted tree shapes

## Utility functions

Miscellaneous functions to simplify or expedite basic functionality.

- [`as.matrix(`*`<ClusterTable>`*`)`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ClusterTable-methods.md)
  [`print(`*`<ClusterTable>`*`)`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ClusterTable-methods.md)
  [`summary(`*`<ClusterTable>`*`)`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ClusterTable-methods.md)
  :

  S3 methods for `ClusterTable` objects

- [`as.ClusterTable()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/ClusterTable.md)
  :

  Convert phylogenetic tree to `ClusterTable`

- [`Hamming()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/Hamming.md)
  : Hamming distance between taxa in a phylogenetic dataset

- [`MSTEdges()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/MSTEdges.md)
  [`MSTLength()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/MSTEdges.md)
  : Minimum spanning tree

- [`SampleOne()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/SampleOne.md)
  : Select element at random

- [`TipTimedTree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/TipTimedTree.md)
  : Display time-calibrated tree using tip information only

- [`UnshiftTree()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/UnshiftTree.md)
  : Add tree to start of list

- [`as.multiPhylo()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/as.multiPhylo.md)
  :

  Convert object to `multiPhylo` class

- [`match(`*`<phylo>`*`,`*`<phylo>`*`)`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/match.multiPhylo.md)
  [`match(`*`<multiPhylo>`*`,`*`<phylo>`*`)`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/match.multiPhylo.md)
  [`match(`*`<phylo>`*`,`*`<multiPhylo>`*`)`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/match.multiPhylo.md)
  [`match(`*`<multiPhylo>`*`,`*`<multiPhylo>`*`)`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/match.multiPhylo.md)
  [`` `%in%`( ``*`<multiPhylo>`*`,`*`<multiPhylo>`*`)`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/match.multiPhylo.md)
  [`` `%in%`( ``*`<multiPhylo>`*`,`*`<phylo>`*`)`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/match.multiPhylo.md)
  [`` `%in%`( ``*`<phylo>`*`,`*`<multiPhylo>`*`)`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/match.multiPhylo.md)
  [`` `%in%`( ``*`<phylo>`*`,`*`<phylo>`*`)`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/match.multiPhylo.md)
  : Tree matching

- [`sapply64()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/sapply64.md)
  [`vapply64()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/sapply64.md)
  [`replicate64()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/sapply64.md)
  : Apply a function that returns 64-bit integers over a list or vector

- [`sort(`*`<multiPhylo>`*`)`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/sort.multiPhylo.md)
  [`` `==`( ``*`<phylo>`*`)`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/sort.multiPhylo.md)
  [`` `<`( ``*`<phylo>`*`)`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/sort.multiPhylo.md)
  [`` `>`( ``*`<phylo>`*`)`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/sort.multiPhylo.md)
  [`` `==`( ``*`<MixedBase>`*`)`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/sort.multiPhylo.md)
  [`` `<`( ``*`<MixedBase>`*`)`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/sort.multiPhylo.md)
  [`` `>`( ``*`<MixedBase>`*`)`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/sort.multiPhylo.md)
  : Sort a list of phylogenetic trees

## Developer functions

Efficient functions without input checks, for developers

- [`edge_to_splits()`](https://ms609.github.io/TreeTools/reference/edge_to_splits.md)
  : Efficiently convert edge matrix to splits
